summary: Comprehensive testing of Trading AI system completed. Backend APIs 93.3% success rate (14/15 tests passed). Frontend 100% functional with excellent UX. All core features working: signal creation, trade execution, position management, portfolio tracking, settings configuration.

minor_issues.issue: Risk manager correctly rejects duplicate positions
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - risk management working properly

design_issues.issue: Reset works via API but UI needs refresh to show updated balance

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with portfolio metrics (Balance, P&L, Positions, Win Rate)
Signals page shows pending signals with filtering (Pending/Executed/Dismissed)
Execute trade from signal - successfully creates new position
Close trade functionality - updates portfolio P&L correctly
Trades page shows open and closed trades with proper tabs
Portfolio page shows statistics and charts
Settings page allows configuration of risk parameters
API /api/trades/execute creates new trade (when risk allows)
API /api/trades/close closes trade and calculates P&L
